GP12agp_bi_u:44585: evaṃ te kathitaṃ vipra vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ //AP_*5.040cd/

GP12agp_bi_u:44594: devāś ca pitarastasya tṛptā yānti yathāsukhaṃ /AP_*5.044ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:44595: yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ prātarutthāya mānavaḥ //AP_*5.044cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44609: etadākhyāhi me sūta tvayaitat suciraṃ purā //AP_*6.001cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44632: tathā te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu vatsa samāhitaḥ //AP_*6.008cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44637: bhṛgoḥ khyātyāṃ mamutpanno mṛkaṇḍurnāma vai sutaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:44639: sumitrā nāma patrī ca mṛkaṇḍostu mahātmanaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:44642: tasyāṃ tasya suto jāto mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ //AP_*6.011cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44645: bubudhe vallabho vālaḥ pitā tatra kṛtakriyaḥ //AP_*6.012cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44646: tasmin vai jātamātre tu ādeśī kaścidabravīt /AP_*6.013ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:44647: varṣe dvādaśame putro mṛtvyārtaś ca bhaviṣyati //AP_*6.013cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44651: tathāpi tat pitā dhīmān yatnāt kālakriyāṃ tataḥ /AP_*6.015ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:44658: tasthau tatra gṛhe dhīmān mārkaṇḍeyo mahādyutiḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:44662: duḥkhitau tau bhṛśaṃ tatra tanmātṛpitarau śuka //AP_*6.018cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44672: vaktum arhasi duḥkhasya kāraṇaṃ mama pṛcchataḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:44675: kathayāmāsa tatsarvaṃ ādeśī yad uvāca ha //AP_*6.021cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44676: tac chrutvāsau suniścāha mātaraṃ pitaraṃ punaḥ /AP_*6.022ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:44679: apaneṣyāmi mṛtyuṃ X tapasā nātra saṃśayaḥ /AP_*6.023ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:44680: yathā cāhaṃ cirāyuḥsthāṃ kuryāṃ tathā mahattapaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:44696: evaṃ matimahāvuddhe kiṃ tvaṃ karma cikīrṣasi //AP_*6.028ef/
GP12agp_bi_u:44706: ko jetuṃ śaknuyān mṛtyuṃ tatastaṃ tapasārcaya //AP_*6.030cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44710: bhaktapriyaṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā taṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GP12agp_bi_u:44721: tasmāt tvaṃ lokakartāraṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ śriyaḥpatiṃ
GP12agp_bi_u:44723: govindaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ satataṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja //AP_*6.035cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44725: vatsa jetāsi mṛtyuṃ tvaṃ sasainyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:44731: ārādhitaś ca bhagavān mama mṛtyuṃ harediti //AP_*6.038cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:44735: tuṅgā ca bhaginī bhadrā dve nadyau mantrasambhave /AP_*6.040ab/
